::Killfest::

Killfest approaches Chamaleon, looking the bot over. By instinct, he 
sized the bot up, and decided that he could easily defeat him in a 
fight.

"Darkfate says you can lend me a shuttle?" Killfest asks him, walking 
up to him.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:
> Darkfate/Chamaleon::
> 
> "Yesss " hissed Darkfate, "Chamaleon can give it"
> 
> Chamaleon appeared in Base's door. He was a strange bot, with 10 
> feet, tall and thin. His metallic skin was gray and some parts of 
his 
> shell he had scales that changed their color. Chamaleon was brigt, 
> big, red eyes and a large tongue.
> 
> Chameleon just waited that his leader arrived where he was.
